title: Gilbert & Sullivan's the Mikado or the town of Titipu
brief_description: Performers include: William Conrad, Clive Revill, Kate Flowers, John Stewart, Anne Collins. The London Symphony Orchestra (London) conducted by Alexander Faris. John McCarthy (Chorus Master), Ambrosian Opera Chorus. Staged by Michael Geliot. Introduced by Douglas Fairbanks Jnr.
